name: Md5-checker
tagline: .net utility for displaying MD5 and SHA-256 checksums
body:
Simple util to check md5 and sha-256 checksums of files.

Binary files in binary-folder. Edit contextmenu.reg in script and double-click to add "Hash" to contextmenu (right-click).

![Screenshot](https://raw.github.com/vattenmelon/md5-checker/gh-pages/images/checksumscreenshot.png)

Download here:
[Releases](https://github.com/vattenmelon/md5-checker/releases)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
